Subject: Neo Beast Wars

Wildfire:




Wildfire walked through the forest with her head hung low. She had 
lost Rowdy Wolf's track. He was gone from her mind and sight. She 
didn't know exactly what he was after now, but he was destined to 
escape from her. She was going to go on and find him. 

But maybe first, she could rest. She had spent days fighting him, 
each being right there in the other's sights when they took a breath.
